name: Silicus Technologies Inc
tag_list: offshore, software, development, services, company, usa, india, microsoft, java-development, mobile-development, android-development
overview:
Texas based Offshore Software Development Company offering Outsourced Software Development Services in Microsoft .NET Development, Java Development, Software Testing, Android Development and QTP Testing Services.

Silicus is a Software Technology Company focused on providing product development services for Independent Software Vendors, Technology Organizations and Enterprises.

Silicus was founded in 2000 in Houston, TX with Compaq Computers Corporation (now part of HP) as the first client. Silicus was responsible for building Compaqâ€™s next generation e-Commerce platform which processed more than $4 Billion dollars of orders in its first year. The success at Compaq led us to expand our client base and facilitated commencing our offshore development center in India.

Silicus works with software companies, helping them to develop and release their products in the market place faster and more cost effectively. Silicusâ€™ consultants and engineers have extensive experience in Software Design and Development in various technologies and domain areas. Our focus areas within the software industry are:

â€¢E-business Solutions (including E-Commerce and CRM) â€¢Collaboration Management â€¢Systems Management â€¢Custom Application Development for Enterprises â€¢Security and Compliance â€¢Mobile Applications

Silicus has successfully set up and managed dedicated engineering teams for several customers for the last 10 years. Over these years Silicus has developed competencies on the following technology domains:

â€¢Microsoft Platform â€¢Java Platform â€¢LAMP Platform â€¢Mobile Platform

Silicusâ€™ service offerings encompass the product development lifecycle and includes New Product Development, Software Modernization (Migration) and Porting, Software Maintenance and Support, Software Quality Assurance and Independent Testing and SDK Development.

Silicusâ€™ development center located in Pune (India) is comprised of outstanding technical and project management resources with an average experience of 5+ years. The development center is certified as ISO 9001:2000 compliant and has been assessed at CMMi Level 3 for Product Development and Maintenance Lifecycle models. In addition, we are also PCI DSS compliant for information and IP protection and security.
